scripts.win: npm run clean && npm run temp-win && npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.mac: npm run clean && npm run temp-mac && npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.smoke-win: npm run clean && npm run temp-win && npx wdio run ./smoke.conf.js
scripts.smoke-mac: npm run clean && npm run temp-mac && npx wdio run ./smoke.conf.js
scripts.api-win: npm run clean && npm run temp-win && npx wdio run ./api.conf.js
scripts.api-mac: npm run clean && npm run temp-mac && npx wdio run ./api.conf.js
scripts.cleanup-win: npm run clean && npm run temp-win && npx wdio run ./cleanup.conf.js
scripts.cleanup-mac: npm run clean && npm run temp-mac && npx wdio run ./cleanup.conf.js
